com.tangosol.coherence.dslquery.internal

Class PropertyBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tangosol.coherence.dslquery.internal.PropertyBuilder

  • public class PropertyBuilder
extends Object
    PropertyBuilder is a utility class that turns property Strings into proper getter and setter names.
    Author:
    djl 2009.08.31

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String m_sPrefixToSuppress
      Prefix string that should be suppressed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PropertyBuilder()
      Construct a new PropertyBuilder.
      PropertyBuilder(String sPrefix)
      Construct a new PropertyBuilder that will suppress the given prefix String.

        public ValueExtractor extractorFor(String sName)
        Make a ValueExtractor for the given String. Allow '.' and make a ChainedValueExtractor.
        Parameters:
        sName - the String used to make ValueExtractor
        Returns:
        the constructed ValueExtractor

      • extractorStringFor

        public String extractorStringFor(String sName)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the constructed String

      • updaterStringFor

        public String updaterStringFor(String sName)
        Make a setter String suitable for use in a ValueUpdater. If String already starts with "set" then leave it alone.
        Parameters:
        sName - the property String used to make setter String
        Returns:
        the constructed String

      • makeSimpleName

        public String makeSimpleName(String sPrefix,
                             String sName)
        Make a camel case String by prefixing a given String with a given prefix. If name already starts with prefix and the following char is uppercase then just name was already a propper camel case getter or setter and return the given String.
        Parameters:
        sPrefix - the String to prefix, typically get or set
        sName - the property String being transformed
        Returns:
        the constructed String

      • plainName

        public String plainName(String sName)
        Returns the specified method name with any "set" or "get" prefix removed and the first letter of the remaining String converted to lowercase.
        Parameters:
        sName - the method name to convert
        Returns:
        the converted method name

      • uniformArrayFor

        protected String[] uniformArrayFor(String[] asProps,
                                   String sPrefix)
        Make a getter or setter String array from the given array of property Strings usingthe given prefix string.
        Parameters:
        asProps - the String[] used to make getters or setters
        sPrefix - the String to be prepended.
        Returns:
        the constructed String array

      • uniformStringFor

        protected String uniformStringFor(String[] asParts)
        Make a String from the given array of Strings parts.
        Parameters:
        asParts - the String[] used to make one string separated by '.'
        Returns:
        the constructed String

      • splitString

        public String[] splitString(String sName,
                            char delim)
        Take a given String and bust apart into a String array by splitting at the given delimiter character.
        Parameters:
        sName - the String to prefix, typically get or set
        delim - the delimiter character
        Returns:
        the constructed String
